basics.name: Staff Accountant
basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Professional accountant with outstanding work ethic and integrity seeking to make a valuable contribution utilizing strong analytical, organizational, communication, and computer skills. Summa Cum Laude graduate with BBA in Accounting. Eight years of accounting experience, with three years of public accounting experience in governmental auditing and five years of private industry accounting and tax experience.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Handled collections from customers, oversaw customer accounts, generated weekly financial reports, assisted with month-end closing, and resolved customer queries among other tasks.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsibilities included preparation of financial statements, reconciliation of financial discrepancies, and maintaining accounting controls among other tasks.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared various tax-related filings including business licenses, annual reports, and business registrations, and managed other projects as required.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Analysis of financial information and preparation of financial reports among other tasks.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed audits of public offices and assisted manager level auditor among other tasks.
